snippet: Jason Bohn, 43, had a heart attack at the Honda Classic in February. His left anterior descending artery, commonly known as the widowmaker, was 99 percent blocked.
abstract: Jason Bohn gets back to grind of golf as he recovers from heart attack he suffered at Honda Classic; Bohn says that if he had not advanced in that tournament, he would not have gone for medical attention, and would not have known about blocked artery in his heart; other players reflect on their own health and consult doctors.
lead_paragraph: Jason Bohn, 43, had a heart attack at the Honda Classic in February. His left anterior descending artery, commonly known as the widowmaker, was 99 percent blocked.

headline.main: After a Round With the Widowmaker, a Golfer Enjoys a More Familiar Grind
headline.print_headline: After a Round With the Widowmaker, a Golfer Enjoys a More Familiar Grind
